column2: You can view todays menu for the higgins cafeteria at the following website: https://menus.sodexomyway.com/BiteMenu/Menu?menuId=15280&locationId=39951001&whereami=https://clarkdining.sodexomyway.com/dining-near-me/resident-dining
You can view the Higgins Cafe schedule at the following website: https://clarkdining.sodexomyway.com/dining-near-me/resident-dining
You can view the Higgins Cafe schedule at the following website: https://clarkdining.sodexomyway.com/dining-near-me/resident-dining

The best way to reach a specific adviser is by sending an email to their Clark email account; you can find contact information at https://www.clarku.edu/who-we-are/people-directory/. The Advising Center also has drop-in hours from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m

You can look up the name of your assigned adviser(s) for your declared programs through the ClarkYou Portal. Visit https://you.clarku.edu/uPortal/f/welcome/normal/render.uP then go to Main Menu → Registrar Office → Student Account → Financial Aid → Student Record → Student Record Information
